overview: The Best. Ever. Mario Lemieux - As Seen on FSN Pittsburgh. “The greatest athlete to ever come out of Pittsburgh. Greatest athlete – bar none. The most respected athlete to come out of this city in our lifetime.” Mike Lange, Penguins Announcer. “I’ve watched all the great hockey players – Rock Richard, Jean Beliveau, Orr, Mikita. There’s nobody as good as Mario. Nobody.” Craig Patrick, Pittsburgh General Manager.
title: The Best Ever: Mario Lemieux
